column2: the service was a little underwhelming. They were out of a lot of stuff
column3: which is to be expected at a finer dining establishment
column4: but it was actually something close to 25% of the food and drinks that we ordered were not available. That's a bit much
column5: especially given it was early in the evening and a Wednesday. Also
column6: the server didn't seem particularly knowledgeable about the dishes other than to say that they were "very good."
